cast.original_title: The Wind That Shakes the Barley
cast.overview: In 1920s Ireland young doctor Damien O'Donovan prepares to depart for a new job in a London hospital. As he says his goodbyes at a friend's farm, British Black and Tans arrive, and a young man is killed. Damien joins his brother Teddy in the Irish Republican Army, but political events are soon set in motion that tear the brothers apart.
cast.title: The Wind That Shakes the Barley

details.biography: As a recent graduate of LCFE Performing Arts course, Philip Wright has participated in several short film projects where he has gained valuable experience in front of the camera. To date, Philip has received an award for ‘Best Newcomer’ and got a nod for ‘Best Actor of the festival’ at the Dublin Comedy International Film Festival.  Confident, easy going, and professional, Philip makes a grand addition to any film set in any acting role required of him.
details.name: Philip Wright
